description: This file defines a frontend UI component 'NotesList' using the LightningJS framework. It renders a list of notes, with functionality to add, delete, and select notes, and manages relevant component state and interactions.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component displaying a list of notes with add, delete, and selection capabilities.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note or 'Untitled' if absent.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Returns a formatted string of the last updated date of a note.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color for a note row based on selection.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates the Y position of a note row in the list.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Determines the color of the trash icon based on hover state.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover state over trash icon.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state when leaving trash icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover state over add button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state over add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Emits selection of a note and updates internal state.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Deletes a note after confirmation, updates remaining selection.
